name: Grass Cutting Simulator v1.2
description:
Have you touched grass? Well, if not, here we go. Grass Cutting Simulator tells you the way of the grass cut. Clearly you can do this at your home but you are lazy. Enjoy.

Instructions are in game.

Update 1.1. Added Levels. Each level has different grass which gives more money than the last. Currently only 5 levels.

Update 1.2. Added 15 more levels.

This was made in one day (about 2.5 hours I actually worked on it).
